personalInformation.title: BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT MANAGER

responsibilities: Responsible of the selling of hydraulic & pneumatic equipment in Mexico and USA to clients in the Energy, Chemical & Mining industries

Meeting quotas of $1.4M USD annually by renewing contracts and opening new accounts within assigned territory Pioneered sales
outreach to potential US clients and developed sales plan to increase client base outside of Mexico Scheduling 2-3 in-person client meetings
with potential US customers on a quarterly basis Managing accounts in the energy industry like PEMEX and in the metallurgical & chemical
industry like MET-MEX PeÃ±oles Developing business plans to identify key opportunities and deliver added value to up-sell products and
services to key accounts Booking customer follow-up calls or in-person meetings with Top 50 accounts bi-monthly to maintain customer
retention Generating sales reports and forecasts for management review Preparing quotations that meet customers specific needs and
support collections efforts.

Obtained new accounts by selling financial products and services to consumers and businesses Consistently achieved sales quota by making
50-60 outbound cold calls per day to potential prospects Maintained relationships to offer the best customer service and provide a
personalized financial advice.
Designed banners and brochures for annual events Translated documents and promotional material from English to Spanish.
